Sean McIntosh

Default

Hello, I'm Sean McIntosh a UK based designer, who is interested in the convergence of design, business and the people they serve. My focus is on user informed design with measurable value, I want to help organisations achieve a win-win.

ALCMY

I currently work at ALCMY as a product UX/UI designer for both in-house and client products. My first project was to design the interface for the NewUrban mobile app â€“ an ongoing responsibility. NewUrban is a platform that helps connect niche urban businesses with people who want to avoid the beaten track.
